DOC.brief_summary: D.fragilis is an intestinal protozoon that feeds by phagocytosis of intestinal bacteria. The study aim to determine if the carriage of the intestinal parasite D.fragilis is associated to changes of gut microbiota in subjects presenting with or without intestinal symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Interactions Between Dientamoba Fragilis and the Gut Microbiota
